Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: MrBig "Biggie"
Reviews.Content: Exactly what I expected. This camera is a bit larger than the smallest cameras, but with all it's capabilities it's a wonder it's as small as it is. A great second camera when paired with a larger SLR.

Reviews.Title: thank you
Reviews.Author: Godwin Mindra
Reviews.Content: As expected and thank-you! will come to buy again. It is a very good product and easy to use. Cheers
